title: M'pengu Emote
body: I have bought an emote in the past, and i was wondering if there was anything said about people who bought emotes, and when we would be rewarded with the Penguin emote?

replies.body: You will receive the animated M'Pengu in your inventory by June 26th at the latest.
will the emote replace the old M'Pengu?

> [{quoted}](name=Hanple,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4X9VNgKv,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-06-14T14:50:55.543+0000)
>
> will the emote replace the old M'Pengu?

The Penguin emote he is refering to is Hat's Off.
